00031 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_L2       1          
00032 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_L2_L3    2          
00033 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_PORT_ENABLE      0x00000001 
00034 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_PORT_INGRESS     0x00000002 
00035 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_PORT_EGRESS      0x00000004 
00036 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_PORT_EGRESS_TRUE 0x00000008 
00037 #define OPENNSL_MIRROR_PORT_DEST_TRUNK  0x00000010
